meta.hero_quote: I think there is something about navy that is so classic and chic.
meta.footer_message: Curated with navy obsession for Jill

philosophy.title: Pants First
philosophy.description: The foundation of a real wardrobe. Eight pairs for every moment.

philosophy.title: Navy Anchors
philosophy.description: One signature color, infinite possibilities. Never black as a substitute.

philosophy.title: Joy in Details
philosophy.description: Life's too short for boring basics. Novelty and delight matter.
